subject: Re: [junit] Hidden fields in Http-Unit
msgSnippet: ... Look at the feature request queue on the sourceforge page for HttpUnit. cjs -- Curt Sampson     +81 90 7737 2974   http://www.netbsd.org
messageBody:
On Fri, 25 Apr 2003, Ranjeet Sahay wrote:

> Secondly, handling of "hidden field" in a form. While testing, it is
> never allow to change the value of a hidden field. Why is this so if it
> is a parameter in the form.

Look at the feature request queue on the sourceforge page for HttpUnit.

cjs
